page.title: 19Keynsham Cricket Club
page.content: The{Keynsham Cricket Club}was founded in 1929 by Frank Taylor.The club has a "200" club for members.There are over 200 members."Sapper" Clark was one of their best players.He started in 1935 and died in 1975. Richard Ollis and Julian Wyatt play for Somerset.When they are not playing they play for Keynsham.The 1st team won the{Western League}in 1979. When England were playing the West Indies Richard Ollis was 12th man and came on the field. On Fridays there is training for the juniors.There are 4 age groups: U-11,U-13,U-15 and U-17.The men have a 1st team,2nd team and a 3rd team,they play in the{Western League}and the{ {Famous Grouse League.}The captain of the 1st team is Adrian Hiller. The club is saving up for a new pavilion.
